CustomField.description: BODEV-67: Renewal Upsell Amount MRR x 12. Requested by CS for reporting purpose. BODEV-2281: Formula tweaked to prevent the field from showing values for irrelevant Opp types.
CustomField.formula:
CASE(StageName, "Closed Lost", 0, "Closed Won", IF(AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Business - Internal Transfer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Business - Platform Transfer")), Original_Renewal_ARR__c > 0),
ARR_manual__c - Original_Renewal_ARR__c,
ARR_manual__c - ( Original_Renewal_ARR__c + New_ARR__c + Internal_Transfer_ARR__c - Churn_ARR_Platform_Transfer__c )), /* When Open, show values only for Renewal and Upsell */ IF( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Business-Renewal") || ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Business-Upsell") || ISPICKVAL(Type, "New Business - Expansion Portal"), ARR_manual__c - ( Original_Renewal_ARR__c + New_ARR__c + Internal_Transfer_ARR__c + New_ARR_Platform_transfer__c - Churn_ARR_Platform_Transfer__c ), IF(AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Business - Internal Transfer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Business - Platform Transfer")), Original_Renewal_ARR__c > 0), ARR_manual__c - Original_Renewal_ARR__c, 0 ) ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sum of total expansion for Sales KPI (incl. cumulative indexation).
CustomField.label: Total Renewal Upsell ARR
